overview_of_class: Experience as a working correspondent at Medill's Washington, D.C., news bureau, which provides locally oriented coverage to client newspapers and television and radio stations. The seminar surveys the political process within the federal government and its effects on decision making; the government as a source of information; amd methods to enrich coverage by going beyond events to the governmental process that give rise to them.
name: Watchdog Journalism
subject: JOUR
